Setup¶

Make sure you have installed all dependencies with:

$ pip install -r requirements.txt

Emulator¶

Remotive Labs Broker¶

  1. Go to Remotive Labs Broker Demo.

  2. Select Start Demo.

  3. Choose a Recording Session.

  4. Select configuration_android in Broker configuration.

  5. Click on Play and go to the broker.

  6. Add the desired signal visualisations:

    • LONGITUDE and LATITUDE for sending location fixes to the emulator.

    • Other relevant signals for VHAL properties and/or sensors.

  7. Copy the url, API key, namespace, and signals from “Examples to subscribe to signals from an external application”.

  8. Use those as arguments to the scripts.
